column4: i have a new pc build and it makes the thinking sound when my hd activity light goes on! does it mean my sata hd is messed up??
the sound didn't happen right away when i installed ubuntu as a OS but now about a week later it happens when i open programs etc
its like the classic crappy computer thinking sound, but this thing is a beast why is it doing it?
for sure... it would be cool to know u had the option
anyone know why my computer is making the thinking sound?? would it be my hard drive?
it makes the sound when my hd activity light blinks
im not too happy that my new pc build is making the thinking sound...the same 1 that old pos pc's make
probably your HDD then
do you know if the drive would be making the noise for any reason or just it being bad?
its just the hard drive seeking and doing its thing
how is it not stable?
no longer supported, wont receive any security updates
as I said, im stretching the word
6.06 and greater
sure, if thats what you want
if you want to install 7.10, thats fine :)
me too
they are
not anymore for 5.10 and below
but 6.06 and up yep
lol, its alright
